(Simplified: 钨)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 烏 indicates the sound; 釒 (metal) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 釒 [ jīn ] gold, metal; money
    • 烏 [ wū ] crow, rook, raven; black, dark
①一種金屬元素，灰黑色的結晶，質硬而脆，熔點很高，可以製成很細的絲和特種合金鋼：鎢絲。鎢鋼。鎢砂(精造的鎢礦石)。
(Simplified: 钨)

Pictophonetic: 烏 indicates the sound; 釒 (metal) conveys the meaning.
Hanzi: 钨

鎢字的基本解释

鎢
wū
见“钨”。

鎢字的汉语字典释义

[①]［wū］
［《廣韻》哀都切，平漠，影。］
“钨1”的繁体字。
(1)见“鎢錥”。
(2)金属元素。符号W。灰色或棕黑色，硬而脆的结晶，耐高温。用以制造灯丝和特种合金钢。

鎢字的康熙字典解释

【戌集上】【金字部】　鎢； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页1317第26
【廣韻】哀都切【集韻】汪胡切，?音烏。【玉篇】鎢錥，小釜。【廣韻】鎢錥，溫器。【博雅】鎢錥謂之銼?。【晉書·杜預傳】釜瓮銚槃鎢錥，皆民閒之急用也。

暂无。

Tungsten
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［wū］
["Guangyun" mourning is cut, flat, and shadow. ]
Traditional characters for "W1".
(1) See "tungsten deposit".
(2) Metal elements. Symbol W. Gray or brown-black, hard and brittle crystal, high temperature resistant. Used to make filament and special alloy steel.

[Guang Yun] Aidu cut [Ji Yun] Wang Hu cut,? Yinwu. [Jade articles] Tungsten, small cauldron. [Guangyun] Tungsten, thermostat. [Bo Ya] What is the file of tungsten powder? [Book of Jin·Du Pre-Biography] Cauldron urn is also an urgent need for the people.
